_header: All been he blithe / that to my song Lithe
_description: The geste of King Horn — in couplets

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Alle ben he bliþe Þat come wilen
                    liþe…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines: …Nou ben he alle dedeGod hem to heuene lede

CULGg4272.First Lines:
Alle beon he bliþeÞat to my song
                    lyþe…

                    blessing

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Alle heo ben blyþeþat tomy song
                    ylyþe…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
Þon hue beoþ boþe dedecrist to heouene vs
                    lede
BLHar2253.Note: 1546 lines; written two lines of verse per line in MS.
